description.en: The fictional Japanese city named Sugomori City is built on reclaimed land. But as the years go by, the city's population is decreasing. One day, Sonosaki tells her classmate Katsuhira: "You have been selected to be a Kiznaiver." The Kizuna System, which allows Katsuhira to share his wounds, connects him to the classmates whose lives and personalities completely differ from his. The Kizuna System is an incomplete system for the implementation of world peace that connects people through wounds. All those who are connected to this system are called Kiznaivers. When one Kiznaiver is wounded, the system divides and transmits the wound among the other Kiznaivers.
description.es-la: Katsuhira Agata es un adolescente tranquilo y reservado cuyo sentido del dolor prácticamente ha desaparecido. Su amiga, Chidori Takashiro, sólo recuerda débilmente los días anteriores a que Katsuhira sufriera este profundo cambio. Ahora, su comportamiento apagado y complaciente convierte a Katsuhira en un objetivo constante de los matones, que se aprovechan de él para obtener atroces sumas de dinero. Pero sus puños sólo consiguen hacerle parpadear, ya que incluso las emociones están lejos de su alcance. Sin embargo, un día Katsuhira, Chidori y otros cuatro adolescentes son secuestrados y obligados a unirse al Sistema Kizuna como "Kiznaivers" oficiales. Los participantes están conectados a través del dolor: si uno de los miembros resulta herido, los demás sentirán la misma agonía. Estos individuos deben convertirse en las ratas de laboratorio y los chivos expiatorios de un sistema incompleto diseñado con la paz mundial en mente. Con sus destinos literalmente entrelazados, los Kiznaivers deben exponer su verdadero yo a los demás, o arriesgarse a fracasar mucho más que el Sistema Kizuna.

altTitles.fr: Le dragon domestique de Mme. Kobayashi

altTitles.es: La sirvienta dragón de la señorita Kobayashi

altTitles.th: น้องเมดมังกรของคุณโคบายาชิ

altTitles.ja: 小林さんちのメイドラゴン

altTitles.pt-br: A Empregada Dragão da Senhorita Kobayashi

altTitles.pt: A Empregada Dragão da Senhora Kobayashi

description.en:
Kobayashi lives alone in an apartment, until one day, Tooru appears and they end up living together. Tooru looks down on humans as inferior and foolish, but having been saved by Kobayashi-san, she does everything she can to repay the debt and help her with various things, although not everything goes according to plan.  
A mythical everyday life comedy about a hard working office lady living with a dragon girl.  


---
- [Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%B0%8F%E6%9E%97%E3%81%95%E3%82%93%E3%81%A1%E3%81%AE%E3%83%A1%E3%82%A4%E3%83%89%E3%83%A9%E3%82%B4%E3%83%B3)
description.ru:
Жила себе и жила Кобаяши-сан. Одна в своей квартире, пока на пороге её дома не появилась Тору, у которой долг перед Кобаяши-сан за своё спасение. И Тору всячески желает вернуть его различными способами каждый день. Милая и повседневная комедия. Только есть одна необычная деталь: Тору – влюбленная драконесса.  
  
Licensed in English by Seven Seas as "Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid."  
  
[See AnimeNewsNetwork for the anime.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=18807)
description.es-la: Kobayashi vive en un apartamento cuando un dia un dragon llamado Tooru toca a su puerta. Tooru piensa que los humanos son humildes y tontos pero ella tiene una deuda con Kobayashi que la salvo en el pasado. Por eso todos los dias Tooru trata de usar sus poderes para ayudar a Kobayashi en varias cosas. Una comedia de una señora de oficina y una linda chica maid dragon viviendo juntas el día a día
description.pt-br: Kobayashi vive sozinha em um apartamento, até que um dia, Tooru, a garota dragão, apareceu e elas acabaram morando juntas. Tooru vê os humanos como seres inferiores e tolos. Mas tendo sido salva por Kobayashi-san, ela faz tudo que pode para pagar a dívida e ajudá-la com várias coisas, embora nem tudo corre conforme o planejado. Uma comédia do cotidiano mítico sobre uma mulher do escritório trabalhando duro para viver com uma garota dragão.

altTitles.en: The Young Lady Is a Royal Chef

altTitles.es: La princesa es un chef imperial

altTitles.ja: お嬢様はロイヤル・シェフ

description.en:
Sena’s been tossed into another world, as the despised daughter of a noble family. Her little restaurant was her refuge in her last life, so she’s got some tricks up her sleeve—cooking skills! 

As Senianna, she’ll put her brains and fine-tuned taste buds (Korean fried chicken, anyone?) to the test so she can take back the kitchen and gain this society’s esteemed title of Chef Royale. Will her cuisine reign supreme over the empire and bring her the sweet and salty balance of power and affection?

---

[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home/55268483)

Official Translations:
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/lady-chef-royale/info)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Royal-Chef-Lady/3380)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/46395)
---
As a chef at a small knight's restaurant, I became the nuisance youngest daughter of a powerful man who was afraid of the emperor. I tried to run away with all my travel expenses…

It’s strange.

“If you say you're sorry, are you that shameless?”
“That’s because I’m your brother.”
“Why don't you take Grandmother on a stroll?”

Why is everyone so nice to me all of a sudden?

“Why do you want to take out someone's eyeballs when they see me?"

People who had caught me trying to escape. I'm just cooking. What's wrong with you?
description.id:
Aku yang dulu hidup dalam penderitaan sewaktu kecil, kini berhasil menjalankan restoran kecil di pinggir jalan dengan guruku yang menjadi orang tua sekaligus teman terbaikku.

Hingga suatu saat, guruku meninggal. Tapi, kemalanganku tidak berhenti di sana. Aku meninggal dan mendapati diriku di dunia lain. Aku kembali hidup sebagai cucu orang paling kuat di wilayah timur?!

Mendapati diriku sebagai Seniana, sekarang aku harus berjuang menjalani hidup dan menjadi royal chef paling hebat!

---

[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home/55268483)

Official Translations:
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/lady-chef-royale/info)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Royal-Chef-Lady/3380)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/46395)
description.ko:
작은 기사 식당의 요리사였던 나는 황제도 두려워하는 권력가의 천덕꾸러기 막내딸이 되었다.
여비를 저축해 도망치려고 했는데…

이상하다.

"네게 미안하다고 하면 염치가 없는 건가."
"그야 내가 네 오빠니까."
"할애비와 산책해 주지 않는 거냐."

다들 갑자기 왜 잘해 주는 거지?

"너를 보는 놈들의 눈알을 죄 뽑아 버리고 싶은 건 왜일까요."

도망치려는 나와 붙잡는 사람들.
요리만 했을 뿐인데 왜 이러는 거람…

---

[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home/55268483)

Official Translations:
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/lady-chef-royale/info)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Royal-Chef-Lady/3380)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/46395)

description.en:
"Please... Kiss Me"

The young man, Yuusei Hakozaki, carries the memory of being kidnapped and confined along with six girls during his childhood. One day, as an adult leading a peaceful life, a girl suddenly appears before him and demands a kiss...!?

Yuusei is told of a single "rule": He must kiss the girls once every 24 hours. If he fails to do so, their heads will explode and they will die.

To save the girls from their deadly fate, Yuusei starts a communal life with them where he must "kiss them every day." In this closed-off miniature Eden, the story begins to unfold. Can Yuusei discern their lies and truths and find his one destined partner?

altTitles.th: ปฏิบัติการแปลงโฉมลูกสาวเจ้าพ่อ

description.en: A story about an ordinary boy named Mekh, whose life is about to change the moment he accidentally hit the infamous and easily-misuderstood girl named Saran.

altTitles.en: I Built the Club of Longevity
I Created the Club of Immortality

description.en: Chen Li works at Mo city, he works there every day with no hope to be seen for the future… until one night. Chen Li obtains a special ability, an ability to buy “Time” and “Lifespan” from people, sell “Time” and “Lifespan” and also let things speed up “Time leap” and slow down “exhaustion time”. So he begins to build a top-class “Lifespan club”!
description.pt-br: Chen Li trabalha na cidade Mo, ele trabalha todo o dia pensando que não há esperanças para o seu futuro... até que uma noite Chen Li consegue uma habilidade especial, a habilidade de comparar e vender tempo de vida, junto a isso ele pode acelerar o próprio tempo e o tempo de outras coisas utilizando o tempo de vida que ele tem

description.en: How would you react if one day you were sucked into an MMORPG and could never get out? After a mysterious incident, roughly 30,000 players from Japan are now forced to live their life inside the MMORPG "Elder Tale" and can not log out. Even death is met with a respawn. Even worse is the fact that food has absolutely no taste. All this combined, many of the players inside this MMO has lost any will to actually play this game, but they are never allowed to leave. A player named Shiro will venture forth to uncover the mystery behind the reason why they are inside this game.

altTitles.es: El esclavo de la élite de soldados de Mato

altTitles.en: Slave of the Magic Capital's Elite Troops

description.en:
The demon-filled dimension known as "Mato" has opened to threaten humanity, and a type of "peach" tree that grows there yields fruit that confers special powers to those who eat it, giving humanity a fighting chance, but this only works for women. As such, as protectors of humanity, women rise in social status while men are relegated to second-class citizens scraping for basic occupation and acknowledgment.   
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, a domestically crafty and laborious high school senior whose older sister was taken during a Mato event 5 years before; while lamenting the hardships of the life ahead of him, an event opens before him, and while being rescued from demons by Captain Kyouka of the Anti-Demon Corps, she confers him powers as her "slave" and turns him into a mighty beast mount that mows down the demons.   
  
However, there is a surprising price to pay for being her "slave"… and it's not him who has to pay it.
description.fr:
La dimension démoniaque connue sous le nom de "Mato" s'est ouverte pour menacer l'humanité, et une sorte de "pêcher" qui y pousse donne des fruits qui confèrent des pouvoirs spéciaux à ceux qui les mangent, donnant à l'humanité une chance de se battre, mais cela ne fonctionne que pour les femmes. Ainsi, en tant que protectrices de l'humanité, les femmes gagnent en statut social tandis que les hommes sont relégués à des citoyens de seconde zone qui se battent pour une occupation et une reconnaissance de base.  
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, une lycéenne rusée et laborieuse dont la sœur aînée a été enlevée lors d'un événement du Mato 5 ans auparavant ; alors qu'elle se lamente sur les difficultés de la vie qui l'attend, un événement s'ouvre devant elle, et alors qu'elle est sauvée des démons par le capitaine Kyouka du Corps Anti-Démon, elle lui confère ses pouvoirs d'"esclave" et le transforme en un puissant monticule animal qui fauche les démons.  
  
Cependant, il y a un prix surprenant à payer pour être son "esclave"… et ce n'est pas lui qui doit le payer.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/takemura4hey/)
description.ru:
Эта боевая фентезийная манга повествует о нескольких героинях, что защищают людей в альтернативном пространстве, именуемом Мато (Город Демонов).  


---

altTitles.ja: ウマ娘シンデレラグレイ

description.en: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray is a spin-off title of the Uma Musume project by Cygames. It follows Oguri Cap through her time at Kasamatsu Training Center Academy and on her journey of becoming a legendary horse girl.
description.ja: 寂れたカサマツの地に現れた、ひとりの灰被りの少女。後に“怪物”と呼ばれるその少女は、どこを目指して疾るのか――。地方から中央の伝説へ。
description.vi: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray là một manga spin-off của series Uma Musume. Câu chuyện kể về Oguri Cap và cuộc hành trình trở thành một Mã Nương huyền thoại của cô.

description.en:
The protagonist, wandering the martial world with a secret of the red dot, has a fateful encounter with a legendary figure and joins the Beggars' Sect.
The master who imparted absolute martial arts to the protagonist meets a mysterious death.
With the death of the master, who was the pillar of the beggars, the Beggars' Sect gradually declines.
In response, the protagonist decides to leave the sect, investigate the master's death, and create a new Beggars' Sect that will not be looked down upon.

Beings from a different dimension have started a war with mankind. To counter this threat, an academy called "Genetics" that trains female warriors called "Pandora," who can wield special weaponry and armor, was formed. Kazuya Aoi decided to enroll in this school because of a promise with his sister, an outstanding alumnus who died in battle. There he meets second year Satellizer L. Bridgette, nicknamed "The Untouchable Queen" due to her solitary demeanor but also top of her class whose battle simulation streak is undefeated, until he came… and slowly changed her.  
  
The Prequels gives back story to several characters; does not effect the main story.  
  
Most FTH and all LetItGo are joint with Vexed Scans.

There were 33 volumes when the series went on hiatus, however, the site producing the chapters is still ongoing.

altTitles.en: The Young Witch Wants To Have Sex?!

altTitles.ja: おぼこい魔女はまじわりたい!

altTitles.zh-hk: 想和見習魔女深入交流！

altTitles.vi: Cô Phù Thủy Trẻ Muốn Được Sex!

description.en: Hiiragi visits Chikage Komori, a transfer student that has never come to school. His chastity is at stake when he comes across a beautiful girl that is wearing nothing but a jacket!?
description.ja: 古森チカゲ。転校生なのに一度も登校した姿を見たことがない彼女のご近所に住む柊木は学校のプリントを届けにいくが、出会った瞬間にいきなりカラダの関係を迫られて!?

altTitles.th: โอตาคุน่องเหล็ก

description.en:
Otaku Sakamichi Onoda has just entered high school and plans to join the anime club. In middle school, Onoda didn’t have any friends with whom he could talk about anime, games, Akihabara and other otaku things, and he is hoping he can make such friends in the anime club, but he finds out it's been disbanded. In order to reestablish the club he tries to find 4 other people who would like to join.  
  
Since he was a little boy, Onoda has ridden his mamachari–a bulky bicycle with a step-through frame mainly used for short rides, such as for casual fun or to pick up groceries–to go to Akihabara every week to check out or buy otaku things. Fellow freshman Shunsuke Imaizumi and bicyclist, while training, notices a boy (Onoda) riding his mamachari up a steep road.  
  
Freshman and road racing cyclist, Shokichi Naruko visits Akihabara to get some Gundam plastic models for his younger brothers and meets Onoda who catches his attention because of the his cycling skill on the mamachari and later find out they go to the same school. Later on, both Naruko and Imaizumi try to convince him to join the bicycle racing club, but will he?


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by m&c! Comics as **Yowamushi Pedal, Go!**

---
- **Won the Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2015, which it shared with The Seven Deadly Sins**

altTitles.ja: 絶滅寸前動物ハッチンパモス

description.en:
The Hacchin-Pamos is a critically-endangered species. Let's find out why.

A daily comic series from Q-Rais.

altTitles.ja: 格闘少女伝説遥かなるリング

description.en:
(from [wikipedia.ja](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E9%81%99%E3%81%8B%E3%81%AA%E3%82%8B%E3%83%AA%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B0)):

Yu Takamine was fascinated by the female pro-wrestlers she saw as a child, and overcoming her parents' opposition, she auditioned for and passed the Tokyo Women's Pro Wrestling Association Match to become a pro-wrestler. 

However, this was only the first step to becoming a wrestler. 

This is the story of Yu, an amateur wrestler who is not particularly strong, and her growth as an apprentice, rookie, heel, idol, and senior wrestler as she explores various fighting styles.

title.en: My Childhood Friend Who I Used to Train Swordsmanship With Became a Slave, so I, as an S-Rank Adventurer, Decided to Buy and Protect Her

altTitles.ja: 一緒に剣の修行をした幼馴染が奴隷になっていたので、Sランク冒険者の僕は彼女を買って守ることにした

altTitles.ja-ro: Issho ni Ken no Shugyou wo Shita Osananajimi ga Dorei ni Natteita no de, S-Rank Boukensha no Boku wa Kanojo wo Katte Mamoru Koto ni Shita
Issho ni Ken no Shugyou o Shita Osananajimi ga Dorei ni Natteita no de, S-Rank Boukensha no Boku wa Kanojo o Katte Mamoru Koto ni Shita

description.en:
S-Rank adventurer and second-generation sword saint, Ryunoa Styler, is reunited with his childhood friend, Aine, who has been reduced to slavery.
Ryunoa purchases Aine in order to save her, however, she's been given a cursed collar that causes the wearer to go into 'heat' once a day...
Ryunoa's battle to find a way to remove the collar starts now!

The stunning financial reporter, Zheng Shuyi, is dating a two-timing scumbag? How could she possibly stand back and do nothing about those love birds: the cheating bastard and his white lotus of a mistress. Upon seeing the Rolls-Royce's plate number of the mistress' uncle, which was a straight numerical number plate, Zheng Shuyi made up her mind. Doesn't the cheater plan to marry rich to retire twenty years early, by going down the laughable CEO route? Then I shall become both you and your mistress' aunt!

A world in which Korea is the global capital of combat sports. At Nam-Il High School where the best and most talented students of martial arts reside, Jiu Ji-Tae suddenly finds himself thrust into their midst despite being a total weakling.  
  
By neutralizing his physical shortcomings through jiu-jitsu, can he rise to the top of the fight classes?  


---
description.fr:
Un monde dans lequel la Corée est le Pays leader des sports de combats. Au lycée Nam-il où les meilleurs et plus talentueux élèves en arts martiaux étudient, Jiu Ji-tae se trouve soudainement entraîné avec eux alors qu'il n'est qu'un faiblard.  
  
En faisant disparaître ses défauts physiques à l'aide du Ju-Jitsu, pourra-t-il devenir le meilleur des classes de combat ?  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/mymmx89)
description.pt-br:
Em um mundo onde a Coréia do Sul é a capital mundial dos esportes de combate, o Colégio Namil é onde os melhores e mais talentosos estudantes de artes marciais competem, e nosso protagonista Jiu Jitei se encontra subitamente em meio à eles mesmo sendo um fracote completo.
  
Superando suas fraquezas com jiu-jitsu, será que Jitei consegue chegar ao topo das turmas de luta?

title.en: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu

altTitles.ja: 猫の手だって役に立つ

altTitles.en: Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

title.en: One Step Closer to the Demon King

altTitles.id: Aku Raja Lautan tapi jadi Gembel

altTitles.en: Even the Demon King, One Step at a Time
One Step to Being Dark Lord
One Step to the Demon King
One Step for the Dark Lord

description.en:
This is no different from ordinary villager life...
"There can be no one stronger than me in this world!"
To become the strongest, Yuria, the Sea Queen, went ashore in search of the Demon King. But when she looked at her reflection, she saw the face of a child. In exchange for her legs, she lost all her strength... Even so, still striving to become the strongest, Yuria begins a painful journey!

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/jumowangyibuzhiyao/list?title_no=1875)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001522)
description.id:
[ "Hanya saja... aku jadi tidak ada bedanya dengan penduduk desa..." ] "Tidak boleh ada makhluk yang lebih kuat dariku di dunia ini!" Untuk menjadi yang terkuat, Yuria, Raja Lautan, datang ke daratan untuk mencari Raja Iblis terkuat. Namun, saat melihat ke cermin, dia melihat wajah anak kecil...? Sebagai ganti kaki, dia telah kehilangan seluruh kekuatannya. Meskipun begitu, ia masih mengincar posisi teratas di dunia! Perjalanannya yang penuh air mata dimulai!

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/jumowangyibuzhiyao/list?title_no=1875)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001522)
description.ko:
["이건 그냥… 마을 사람 A랑 다를게 없잖아…"]

"나보다 강한 존재는 이 세계에 있을 수 없어!"
세계관 최강자 자리를 위해 지상최강 "마왕"을 찾아
뭍으로 나온 바다의 왕 "유리아" 

그런데… 거울을 보니 웬 어린아이가…?
다리를 얻음과 동시에 
그녀의 모든 힘이 사라져 버렸다...

그럼에도 여전히 세계최강 자리를 노리고 있는
 그녀의 눈물겨운 여정이 시작된다!!

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/jumowangyibuzhiyao/list?title_no=1875)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001522)
description.ru:
Это… Ничем не отличается от деревенской жизни... В этом мире не может быть существа сильнее меня!” Чтобы стать сильнейшей, Юрия, Морская Королева, вышла на сушу в поисках Короля Демонов. Но… Посмотрев на свое отражение, она увидела лицо ребенка... В обмен на ноги она потеряла все свои силы... Даже так, все еще стремясь стать сильнейшей, начинается мучительное путешествие Юрии!

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/jumowangyibuzhiyao/list?title_no=1875)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001522)
description.zh:
深海女王无奈变成小孩？
落魄海王的陆地称霸之旅！
大海之王友丽亚为了称霸天下，特地上岸来到陆地上寻找魔王一决胜负。可上岸后才发现，自己失去了所有的力量，而且还变成了小孩子？为了称霸天下，友丽亚辛酸的崭新旅程就此拉开帷幕！

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/jumowangyibuzhiyao/list?title_no=1875)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001522)

title.en: I Met the Male Lead in Prison

altTitles.ko: I Met the Male Lead in Prison (2023)

altTitles.es: Conocí al protagonista masculino en una celda (2023)

altTitles.ru: Я встретилась с главным героем в тюрьме (2023)

altTitles.zh: 在监狱里驯服了忠犬系男主人公 (2023)

altTitles.mn: Би шоронд эрэгтэй гол дүртэй уулзсан (2023)

description.en:
I met the male lead in the prison. I know he's supposed to be a 19+ tragedy novel male lead, but... Why is he like that?

"Woof! Woof! Woof! Grrr."

It was said that he was cursed to turn into a beast... So, what is it like to awaken from the curse?

"T-t-take responsibility, or d-don't touch me!"

I just felt relieved, thinking there wouldn't be any romantic feelings or involvement between me and the male lead.

"One year later. P-please meet me... on the day I get out of here!"

Meeting him didn't seem too difficult, so I agreed. So I was released first, but...

**

”Come on in. My lovely little sister who's as charming as the flower."

On the day I was released, the man who approached me turned out to be my brother.
I was the villain's sister.

"You went through a lot on my behalf, didn't you? I've been waiting for you."

…Fuck. On top of it all, I’m the precious little sister of the villain who is the male lead’s nemesis?

**

Three years later, when we met again, the male lead smiled with a completely different face.

"Hello, Iyana. I'm going to kidnap you from now on."

altTitles.es-la: El Retorno De La Constelación Rota

description.en:
After being put on trial, the deity once known as The Divine Twilight is offered a job by Thanatos, king of the underworld! Now, the fallen deity is back on Earth as his former self, Lee Changsun, and is tasked with sealing those trying to invade from beyond. With the promise of a fresh start, Changsun is gathering the gear and skills needed to get the job done, but he's feeling some watchful eyes on him...

Will this Divine Twilight see a new day, or is the sun setting on his second chance?
description.ko:
한낱 인간에서 신의 위치까지 오른 '신들의 황혼'
흉신으로 위명을 떨치다 신좌, 신앙, 신위…… 모든 걸 잃었다.
신성도 끊어졌고, 신력도 사라졌다.

“짐과 같이 일을 좀 해 주었으면 한다.”

그런 그에게 명계의 주인, 타나토스가 손을 내미는데……
그 손을 잡은 '신들의 황혼'은 이제 플레이어 '이창선'으로 다시 살기 시작한다.
자신을 나락으로 떨어트린 신들의 목을 쥐기 위해!

‘돌아왔구나, 정말로.’

description.en:
The new series from Ken Wakui, the creator of Shinjuku Swan and Tokyo Revengers!

As the battle to decide the next leader of the Yotsurugi gang that runs Asakusa is heating up, a meteorite strike suddenly awakens superpowers in the people of Japan. How will Hibaru Yotsurugi, the son of the previous gang leader, come out of this?!
description.fr: Le nouveau manga de Ken Wakui, le créateur de Shinjuku Swan et Tokyo Revengers ! Alors que la bataille pour désigner le prochain chef du clan Yotsurugi qui dirige Asakusa s'intensifie, la chute d'une météorite réveille soudainement des super-pouvoirs chez les Japonais. Comment Hibaru Yotsurugi, le fils du précédent boss du clan va-t-il s'en sortir ?

altTitles.ja: 魔術師クノンは見えている

altTitles.en: Kunon the Sorcerer Can See Through

description.en:
Kunon Glion, who was born blinded by the curse known as the “Hero’s Scar" Unable to see, or even see the meaning of life, he spent his childhood in apathy. 

Then one day, a water emblem appears on his body, and it turns out he is capable of magic. 

"I want to make eyes with magic—." That curiosity will turn the boy into a water magic genius!

title.en: Sokushi Cheat ga Saikyou Sugite, Isekai no Yatsura ga Marude Aite ni Naranai n desu ga

altTitles.en: My Instant Death Ability Is So Overpowered, No One in This Other World Stands a Chance Against Me!
The Other World Doesn't Stand a Chance Against the Power of Instant Death

altTitles.ja: 即死チートが最強すぎて、異世界のやつらがまるで相手にならないんですが。－ΑΩ－

altTitles.zh: 秒杀外挂太强了，异世界的家伙们根本就不是对手。 –AΩ-

altTitles.ko: 즉사 치트가 너무 최강이라 이세계 녀석들이 전혀 상대가 되지 않습니다만. –AΩ-

altTitles.ja-ro: Sokushi Cheat ga Sai Tsuyo Sugite, Isekai no Yatsu-ra ga Marude Aite ni Naranain Desuga. - AΩ -

altTitles.es: El Otro Mundo No Tiene Ninguna Posibilidad Frente Al Poder De La Muerte Instantánea

altTitles.en: My Instant Death Ability Is So Overpowered, No One in This Other World Stands a Chance Against Me! —AΩ—

description.en:
Growth cheats? Infinite magic power? The ability to utilize all archetypes? What’s the point if instant death ends everything with a single attack? 
 
Awaking to absolute chaos and carnage while on a school trip, Yogiri Takatou discovers that everyone in his class has been transported to another world!

He had somehow managed to sleep through the entire ordeal himself, missing out on the Gift — powers bestowed upon the others by a mysterious Sage who appeared to transport them. Even worse, he and another classmate were ruthlessly abandoned by their friends, left as bait to distract a nearby dragon. Although not terribly bothered by the thought of dying, he reluctantly decides to protect his lone companion. After all, a lowly Level 1000 monster doesn't stand a chance against his secret power to invoke Instant Death with a single thought!

If he can stay awake long enough to bother using it, that is...
description.tr:
Büyüme hileleri? Sonsuz büyü gücü? Tüm ark tipte yetenekleri kullanma yeteneği? Anında bir ölüm her şeyi tek bir saldırı ile sonlandırırsa amaç ne?  
  
Lise öğrencisi Yogiri Takatou, gezi otobüsüne saldıran bir ejderhayla uyandığı bir okul gezisine çıktı, sadece otobüste kalanlar o ve panik içindeki kız sınıf arkadaşı olan Tomochika Dannoura idi. Görünüşe göre sınıf arkadaşlarının geri kalanı, kendisini Sage(Bilge) olarak tanıtan ve ejderha yemi olarak geride bıraktı.  
  
Ve böylece Yogiri, tam olarak ne olduğu hakkında hiçbir fikri olmayan, tehlike dolu paralel bir evrene atıldı. Aynı şekilde, onları çağıran Sion, dünyasına ne tür bir varlık çağırdığına dair hiçbir fikri yoktu.  
  


---

**Links:**  
- [Mangaka's Twitter](https://twitter.com/twitydk)  
- [Japanese Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5691dd/)  
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/s/my-instant-death-ability-is-so-overpowered-no-one-in-this-other-world-stands-a-chance-against-me/)

title.en: In the Name of Bai Ze

description.en: Several decades ago, the young boy Bai Ze mistakenly entered a mystical world's immortal mountain and formed a bond with an Immortal Gege. Over ten years later, the college student Baize once again arrives in the mystical realm, only to discover that the Immortal Gege he had dreamed of day and night has become a pitiable figure forgotten by the mortal world. In a world where demons and monsters wreak havoc, the unfortunate originator turns out to be this pitiful divine being. Unable to ignore the situation, Bai Ze forcefully brings his Immortal Gege back into the mortal realm, helping him fulfill his desire for a peaceful life. After all, who could resist someone so beautiful, powerful yet pitiful?
description.pl: Młody chłopiec o imieniu Bai Ze przypadkiem wszedł do mistycznego świata, w którym normalne było potwory i bóstwa. Zaprzyjaźnił się tam z przystojnym nieśmiertelnym mężczyzną, lecz musiał wracać do rodziców. Ponad dziesięć lat później Bai Ze ponownie trafia do tajemniczego wymiaru, gdzie odkrywa, że poznane uprzednio bóstwo, o którym śnił nocami i dniami, stało się zapomnianą przez wszystkich postacią. Nie będąc w stanie tego zignorować, Bai Ze siłą zabiera go do swojego świata, pomagając mu spełnić marzenie o spokojnym życiu.
description.zh: 十数年前，小正太白泽误入异世仙山，与神仙大哥哥结缘。 十数年后，大学生白泽再次来到异世，却发现日思夜梦的神仙大哥哥成了被人世遗忘的可怜人 世间妖魔作乱，始作俑者却就是这个可怜兮兮的神仙。 没办法，白泽硬拉着神仙哥哥重新入世，帮他完成安稳世间的愿望，谁让他又美又强又惨呢？

altTitles.ja: 理解のあるカレンちゃん

description.en:
“You’re amazing for being alive another day!”

A Manga about a caring girlfriend who rewards you with a “log-in bonus” every day.

title.en: How the Little Brother Who Turned Into a Girl Became His Big Brother's Girlfriend

altTitles.ja: 兄貴の彼女になる、女の子になっちゃった弟。

altTitles.ja-ro: Aniki no Kanojo ni Naru, Onnanoko ni Nacchatta Otouto

altTitles.en: When I Returned Home for the First Time in a Long Time, My Brother Transformed Into a Girl

altTitles.ja: 久しぶりに実家に帰ったら弟がTSしてた。

altTitles.ja-ro: Hisashiburi ni Jikka ni Kaettara Otouto ga TS Shiteta.

description.en:
When I returned home for the first time in a long time, my little brother transformed into a girl!?

---

[Fantia 18+ Content](https://mangadex.org/title/7a23de9c-01b8-43bd-ac38-0bfe0bebcc3b)
description.id: Ketika aku pulang ke rumah setelah sekian lamanya adik tiri laki-laki ku berubah menjadi gadis!?

description.en: Mini is a "Scum Detector", and her latest job is from a rich girl who wants to test her boyfriend's loyalty. However, her boyfriend, Zhao Yueming, is a straightforward gentleman, and Mini's usual methods don't work on him. This is a bit tricky for Mini, who is used to dealing with scumbags regularly. This game of tug-of-war between the womanizer and the one who understands them best is about to begin. Who will fall into the trap of love first?!

Elementary school student Ichijou Hotaru has moved with her parents from Tokyo to the middle of the country. Now she must adapt to her new school, where there are a total of 5 students in the same class who range through elementary and middle school ages. Join their everyday adventures in the countryside.
description.ru:
История разворачивается в отдаленной деревеньке Асахигаока, в школе, где учится всего пять учеников, причем каждый — на разном году обучения. Однажды 11-летняя Хотару Итидзё переселилась из Токио в настоящую японскую глубинку – настолько глухую, что до ближайшего книжного магазина час езды поездом. Нравы здесь простые, двери никто не запирает – зачем, ведь все друг друга знают до седьмого колена. Излишне говорить, что в сельской школе в одной комнате учится все местное детское население – первоклассница Рэнгэ, семиклассница Нацуми, ее сестра восьмиклассница Комари и их на год старший брат Сугуру. А теперь вот еще и пятиклассница Хотару прибавилась! Конечно, сперва многие сцены деревенского быта показались юной столичной жительнице странными и необычными. Но потом Хотару, кстати, в обоих отношениях весьма развитая для своего возраста, начала понимать, что «на всякого мудреца довольно простоты». На природе под ясным небом чувства делаются проще, чище и глубже, а развлекаться с подругами среди полей и холмов можно не хуже, чем в каменных джунглях Гиндзы или Синдзюку. У главной героини появился отличный шанс стать лучше, мудрее и ответственнее, и тогда за взрослую и зрелую девушку ее будет принимать не только наивная малышка Комари!  
  
The following are links to AnimeNewsNetwork for the anime:  
[Season 1](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=15149)  
[OAV 1](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20465) (side story)  
[Season 2](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=16655)  
[OAV 2](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20466) (side story)  
[Movie](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20464) (sequel to season 2)  
[Season 3](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=22215)
description.pt-br:
Bem-vindo à vila rural de Asahigaoka, uma pitoresca cidade distante da agitação da cidade grande. Você não poderia imaginar um cenário mais isolado em todo o Japão. Então, quando Ichijou Hotaru, uma estudante do ensino fundamental criada em Tóquio, se transfere para a pequena escola secundária de Asahigaoka devido ao trabalho de seu pai, ela enfrenta o choque cultural de sua vida!

Junte-se a Hotaru e seus novos amigos, a excêntrica Renge e as irmãs travessas Natsumi e Komari, enquanto compartilham aventuras diárias no idílico interior japonês.

description.ja:
ハカセが拾った子猫が不思議なクスリでネコミミ少女になっちゃった!  
かわいいネコミミメイドさんを愛でて甘える、ゆるふわほのぼの百合漫画です。  
  
モノクロ漫画7ページ・後書きイラスト・カラーイラスト3点収録。

description.en:
A dog named Weed happens to hear he is the son of Gin, the great leader of Ohu, who lead the dogs of Ohu to victory in a fight against the monstrous bear Akakabuto.   
Weed wants to find his father no matter what.   
On his way to find him, Weed hears that his father has been captured by a ruthless villain called Hougen.  
  
Sequel to Ginga Nagareboshi Gin.

Koto, Aya, and Erika were secretly in love with each other.

Koto's thoughts reach Aya for a short while, but Aya disappears as if she had been spirited away.

Seven years later, however, Aya appears to Koto and Erika as she was then...

altTitles.en: The Greatest Sect Leader of All-Time

description.en: All the members of my sect are abnormally strong. All my disciples turn out to be big shots, and I'll definitely become invincible in this world!
description.fr: Ma quête est de développer une secte qui serait un foyer chaleureux pour ses membres. Dedans, non seulement le chef de secte est amusant (ouais c'est moi) mais les disciples sont excentriques, aux personnalités très variées. Ils ont comme particularités d'être en constante évolution et d'être anormalement forts. Tous se révèlent être des gros bonnets, et moi, leur patriarche, je deviendrai invincible ! Approchez, les enfants, rejoignez ma secte et ensemble nous réaliserons vos rêves !

altTitles.en: Ah, Hang on a Little Longer, My Lord

altTitles.ja: お待ちください、領主様！

altTitles.es: Ah, por favor sea paciente, ¡mi señor!

description.en:
Rose is the ruler of the dominion of ‘White’, a small and poor land. She was getting along with her citizens and living a quaint, favorable life until foreign migrants kept increasing and she got involved in some odd situations?! The lively, entertaining, romance, fantasy story of a super OP ruler Rose and Yggdrasil, the grand sorcerer who wants to hide her away and protect her!

---
When the Kingdom of White was conquered 500 years ago, the king and his subjects were exiled to a small tract of wasteland covered in ice. There they endured cold and hunger, relying on the magic of Archmage Yggdrasil to build the world’s smallest self-governing territory. As the last heir to her family, Rose now rules over this land as its lord. Rescuing former citizens who have fallen prey to trafficking abroad, she pours her heart and soul into making them thrive at home. But first things first, she must fill up the treasury to fund this mission! The business-savvy lord invites dragons, dwarfs, and elves to join in the effort, turning White into a haven for all races. Yggdrasil couldn’t be prouder of this utopia in the making, but will Lord Rose ever get to leave her money troubles behind?

---
**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/patience-my-lady)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/qingrenrenwodelingzhudaren/list?title_no=1815)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/lord-calmdown/list?title_no=3578)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001625)
description.ko:
작고 가난한 영지 ‘화이트’의 영주, 로즈.
영주민들과 오순도순 잘 먹고 잘살고 싶었는데, 갑자기 이종족 이주민이 늘고 자꾸 사건에 휘말린다?! 
막강 능력 영주님 ‘로즈’와 그녀를 영지에 몰래몰래 숨겨 놓고 보호하고픈 스승, ‘대마법사 이그드라실’의 유쾌 발랄 로맨스 판타지!

---
**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/patience-my-lady)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/qingrenrenwodelingzhudaren/list?title_no=1815)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/lord-calmdown/list?title_no=3578)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001625)
description.tr:
Rose, küçük ve fakir bir bölge olan White'ın hükümdarıdır. Göçmenlerin artmasına
ve garip olaylara dahil oluncaya kadar halkıyla iyi anlaşıyor ve hoş, güzel bir hayat yaşıyordu.
Güçlü ve yetenekli hükümdar Rose ve onu gizleyip korumak isteyen Usta Sihirbaz Yggdrasil'in heyecanlı,
eğlenceli, aşk ve fantazi hikayesi!
description.zh:
活泼领主X超强大魔法师！
充满惊喜的领地生活开始！
露丝·白是贫寒的白领地领主，她的身边有大魔法师伊格·德拉希尔辅佐。身为白的老师，他担任着领地的各种职务。为了领地的繁荣露丝不断尝试各种冒险，然而异族渐渐踏入领地，也因此带来各种问题...乐天女领主该如果解决迎面而来的难题呢？

---
**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/patience-my-lady)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/qingrenrenwodelingzhudaren/list?title_no=1815)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/lord-calmdown/list?title_no=3578)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001625)
description.zh-hk:
狹小又貧脊的「白色領地」領主——羅茲，夢想與領地居民一起和睦生活，卻因為異族移民增加，不斷捲入各種事件。 具有強大力量的領主羅茲，與在背後默默守護領地與羅茲的師傅——大魔法師 伊克德雷瑟將會展開什麼歡樂的浪漫奇幻故事？

---
**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/patience-my-lady)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/FANTASY/qingrenrenwodelingzhudaren/list?title_no=1815)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/lord-calmdown/list?title_no=3578)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001625)

altTitles.ja: ギャルくんの恋はきっと

description.en:
You don't know how I feel, so why are you being kind to me?

Yoshi, who is super-cheerful, has a secret after-school date with Fuji, a sober boy who is the complete opposite.
It's supposed to be "practice for Fuji-kun to find a lover", but Yoshi secretly has a crush on Fuji!?
If love is revealed, this relationship will end
But his heart throbs at times when Fuji-kun is too cool!
In fact, whereabouts of the love of the super brave Gal-kun...

A plain handsome guy who doesn't know love x a brave gal-kun who is timid about love.
description.es-la:
¿Por qué eres amable conmigo si no sabes como me siento?
El alegre y fiestero Yoshi tiene citas en secreto después de la escuela con su puro opuesto, el callado Fuji.
"Es práctica para cuando consigas pareja" es la excusa que pone Yoshi, ¿¡¿pero en realidad tiene un amor no correspondido?!?
Si descubre que lo amo, esta relación llegará a su fin, ¡pero a veces Fuji-kun es tan genial que me va a mil el corazón!
¿Qué será del amor de este chico que se esfuerza por verse bonito, pero que en realidad es super valiente?
﻿
La historia BL de un chico calmado guapo que no conoce el amor y un chico bonito que es tímido en el amor pero valiente.

description.en: Makoto Toba hates everyone in his class. Everyone except Sakura Toowa, an introverted high school girl who lives with her grandma and loves video games. But one day, Sakura disappears(?) right in front of Makoto. Makoto continues to visit the site of her disappearance on the anniversary for the next 16 years. That is, until Sakura comes back from the time slip she was stuck in, and to her not a moment has passed. Now at 32 with a girlfriend, Makoto has to take care of his 16-year-old childhood crush. What could possibly go wrong?

Kirara is seen as a cute and girly boy by others. However, he wants to be a cool and manly guy! So when two tall and cool boys move in nearby, he starts to follow them around to learn how to be manly. As they grow up together, Kirara realizes that his feelings towards the younger brother, Ken, isn't just simple friendship.

description.ar: قصر فاخر في أفضل مكان بطوكيو. يعيشُ سبعة أشقاء من عائلة شيونجي، وجميعهم جميلونَ للغاية. ونرى مغامرة أراتا العائلية بين صراع إيجاد الذات والوصول إلى أهدافهِ كونهُ الابن الأكبر للعائلة
description.en: The love between brother and sister. The love between man and woman. That which is most forbidden is most unyielding. The two sons and five daughters of the Shiunji family shine like brilliant gems, each with intelligence and beauty in equal measure. And with the pedigree of their wealthy father behind them, how could they not be the talk of the town? Eldest son Arata has spent his life being tossed around by the whims of his colorful sisters, yet a little teasing won’t stop him from valuing his family over anything and anyone else. But when his youngest sister turns fifteen, their father reveals a long-hidden secret of the Shiunji “siblings” and knocks Arata’s world off its axis…
description.ja:
東京都世田谷区成城。都内有数の高級住宅街に豪邸を構える「紫雲寺家」。
７人の兄弟姉妹、特に５人の美人姉妹が有名となっているが、長男の男子高校生・新は姉妹にタジタジの毎日。
「もし自分に姉妹がいなかったら…」と、ついそんな妄想もしてしまう日々の中、父親から衝撃の事実を告げられて…？
description.pt-br: O amor entre irmão e irmã. O amor entre homem e mulher. Aquilo que é mais proibido é mais inabalável. Os dois filhos e as cinco filhas da família Shiunji brilham como pedras preciosas, cada um com inteligência e beleza incoparáveis. E com o pedigree de seu rico pai por trás deles, como poderiam não ser o assunto da cidade? O filho mais velho, Arata, passou a vida sendo infernizado pelos caprichos de suas deslumbrantes irmãs, mas nenhuma  provocação iria o impedir de valorizar sua família acima de tudo e de todos. Mas quando sua irmã mais nova completa quinze anos, seu pai revela um segredo há muito escondido dos "irmãos" Shiunji e vira o mundo de Arata de cabeça para baixo...

altTitles.ja: 茜部先生は照れ知らず

description.en:
Kouki Sakieda is an assistant for Akira Akanabe, a manga artist he admires, who always tries to praise him in some way. Sakieda is worried that he will end up falling in love with her if this situation continues. Then Akanabe unexpectedly asks him to go out with her... 

The story depicts the daily life of Akanabe-sensei, who lavishes praise on Sakieda without embarrassment, and Sakieda, who tries to accept it all gracefully.
description.pt-br:
Kouki Sakieda é assistente de Akira Akanabe, uma mangaká que ele admira. Ela sempre tenta elogiá-lo de alguma forma. Sakieda está preocupado que possa acabar se apaixonando por ela se essa situação continuar. Então, inesperadamente, Akanabe o convida para sair...
A história retrata o dia a dia da Sensei Akanabe, que distribui elogios a Sakieda sem qualquer constrangimento, e de Sakieda, que tenta aceitar tudo com elegância.

title.en: Goddess of Victory: Nikke - Sweet Encount

altTitles.ja: 勝利の女神：NIKKE すいーとえんかうんと

altTitles.ja-ro: Shouri no Megami: Nikke - Sweet Encounter

altTitles.en: Goddess of Victory: Nikke - Sweet Encounter

altTitles.ja-ro: Shouri no Megami: Nikke - Sweet Encount

description.en:
In this manga, NIKKE and their friends live peacefully. A loose comedy in which the main character N102 works as a maid at a maid café called "Maid For You", where Cocoa and Soda work too!

The first official manga based on the popular mobile game *Goddess of Victory: NIKKE* with over 25 million downloads worldwide!
description.ja: 全世界累計2500万DL突破の大人気アプリゲーム『NIKKE』の公式初まんが。このまんがの世界では、NIKKEたちは平和に過ごす――。主人公Nがココアやソーダがいるメイド喫茶「メイド・フォー・ユー」でメイドとして働くゆるふわコメディ♪

description.en:
Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

title.en: Yumeochi ~Yume de Bokura wa Koi ni Ochiru~

altTitles.ja: ユメオチ～ユメで僕らは恋にオチる〜

altTitles.fr: Yumeochi : Rêver de tomber amoureux de toi

altTitles.pt-br: Yumeochi: Sonhando em me apaixonar por você

altTitles.en: Yumeochi: Dreaming of Falling For You

altTitles.id: Yumeochi: Bermimpi Tentang Jatuh CInta Kepada Mu

description.en: Even in university, Chono is stuck in the past regrets of his high school years. His dull days come to an abrupt end when he comes across a mysterious book... A book that allows him to return and re-do his high school life in his dreams. Follow Chono and the girls of his dreams as they reshape their wasted youths!
description.fr: Même à l'université, Chono est coincé dans les regrets de ses années de lycée. Ses journées ennuyeuses s'arrêtent brusquement lorsqu'il tombe sur un livre mystérieux... Un livre qui lui permet de revenir et de refaire sa vie de lycéen dans ses rêves. Suivez Chono et les filles de ses rêves alors qu'ils remodèlent leur jeunesse gâchée !
description.ja: やり残したことだらけの高校生活を送ったぼっち大学生の蝶野ツトム。空虚な日々を過ごす中で、偶然手にした不思議な本…。それはなんと、夢の中で超リアルな高校時代に戻れるものだった!!　関わることのなかった少女たちとの学園生活が始まる――。青春やり直し“夢”ラブコメ開幕!!
description.pt-br: Mesmo na universidade, Chono está preso aos arrependimentos do passado de seus anos de colegial. Seus dias monótonos terminam abruptamente quando ele se depara com um livro misterioso…. Um livro que lhe permite voltar e refazer sua vida de colegial em seus sonhos. Siga Chono e as meninas de seus sonhos enquanto reformulam seus jovens desperdiçados!

description.en: Igel sama the demon who soon will become the greatest member of the Demon King Army's Four Heavenly Kings! Except that on the day she thought she would finally be promoted she instead get transferred to the Demon Resources Department which seems to be the subject of lots of suspicious and scary rumors…
Because his beloved was killed by a silat master, KOLOMENJENG returns to the silat world to find the culprit!
description.id: Karena pujaan hati dibunuh oleh seorang pendekar, KOLOMENJENG kembali ke dunia persilatan untuk mencari pelakunya!

altTitles.en: I Will Politely Decline the Male Lead!

altTitles.mn: Би эелдэгээр эрэгтэй гол дүрээс татгалзах болно!

altTitles.ja: 男主人公は丁重にお断りします！

altTitles.zh-hk: 我會禮貌地拒絕男主角

description.en:
A girl obsessed with a novel suddenly finds herself transported into the thick of the plot. The problem is, she has taken on the role of the villain in the story. And she knows how this ends… it's off with her head! Maybe she'll just let this play out and wake up back in reality… But after a few too many deaths to no avail, it's finally time to go off-script. She's going to have a little fun with this tale. She's made up her mind… to live!

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.bomtoon.tw/detail/namju_RJ)
* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_1000570)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://www.lezhin.jp/ja/comic/okotowari)
description.fr:
Condamnée à mourir le jour de ses 20 ans puis à ressusciter encore et toujours pour l'éternité, c'est là, sa malédiction. Mais quitte à voir son avenir ruiné, autant vivre comme on le souhaite! La méchante est bien décidée à suivre cet adage et a changé l'histoire du roman où elle se trouve. L'héroïne, sa rivale? Plus question! Elle est tellement adorable, plutôt en faire sa meilleure amie! Le fiancé? Un prince héritier cruel et idiot, mieux vaut l'éliminer du paysage. Cependant, à chacune de ses décisions s'éloignant de l'histoire originale, le futur se modifie. Jusqu'où va-t-elle bouleverser le cours du roman et tous ses personnages?

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.bomtoon.tw/detail/namju_RJ)
* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_1000570)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://www.lezhin.jp/ja/comic/okotowari)
description.ko:
비참하게 처형당하는 소설의 악역으로 빙의했다.
사망플래그를 피하기 위해 별짓 다 해봤지만, 돌아오는 건 결국 죽음뿐.
세 번째 회귀하던 날, 나는 결심했다.
막 살기로!

“이렇게 살아도 죽고, 저렇게 살아도 살해당하는 판에
나 하고 싶은 대로 하고 살겠다!”

그러나 원작에서 너무 멀어진 탓일까.
원래대로라면 원작 여주에게 향했어야 할 남주들의 관심이
어째서인지 나한테 향하는 것 같다……?

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.bomtoon.tw/detail/namju_RJ)
* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_1000570)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://www.lezhin.jp/ja/comic/okotowari)
description.uk:
Вона стала лиходійкою в романі, якій судилося жалісна смерть. У своєму першому житті вона пішла за оригінальною історією і померла. Потім знову прокинулась в тілі лиходійки. Під час наступної спроби вона робила все, щоб уникнути смерті, але врешті-решт її знову чекала лише вона.
Як би я не жила, все одно помру, чи не краще жити так, як хочеться?
Проте, щось я надто далеко відійшла від оригінального сюжету. Чому раптом головний герой зацікавився мною?...

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.bomtoon.tw/detail/namju_RJ)
* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_1000570)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://www.lezhin.jp/ja/comic/okotowari)
description.zh-hk:
她在一部小說中被當作惡棍附身，在小說中被悲慘地處決。

我嘗試了一切來避免死亡標誌，但最終，只有死亡浮出水面。在第三次回歸的那天，我下定了決心。讓我們活下去吧！

"如果我這樣生活，我會死，如果我那樣生活，我會被殺！"

但這是因為它離原版太遠了嗎？主角對原版女主角的興趣似乎以某種方式針對了我......？

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.bomtoon.tw/detail/namju_RJ)
* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_1000570)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://www.lezhin.jp/ja/comic/okotowari)

altTitles.th: แปลงโฉมเธอจนเจอรัก

description.en: After tomboy Haedam is thoroughly friend zoned by her first love, she's determined to glow up before college. But when she makes the wrong impression on her first day of school, she realizes she needs the help of her reluctant neighbor. In exchange, she promises to put up with their living circumstances and keep his secret. What could possibly go wrong?

Kim Hayeon was just covering for a friend at their day job when she unexpectedly ends up inside cellist Ji Sehun’s private waiting room. Despite his immense musical talent, Sehun is aloof and cold-hearted, and doesn’t take kindly to Hayeon’s intrusion. Though he accuses her of attempted theft, he cannot get her out of his mind, and attempts to court her. But while Hayeon may be timid, she is not easily won over. If this cellist isn’t careful, he may end up being the one getting played.
description.pt-br: Kim Hayeon estava apenas cobrindo uma amiga em seu trabalho diário quando inesperadamente acaba dentro da sala de espera privada do violoncelista Ji Sehun. Apesar de seu imenso talento musical, Sehun é indiferente e insensível, e não gosta da intromissão de Hayeon. Embora ele a acuse de tentativa de roubo, ele não consegue tirá-la da cabeça e vai tentar cortejá-la. Mas enquanto Hayeon pode ser tímida, ela não é facilmente conquistada.

description.en:
Nezumi is a girl who was raised as a hitman by the yakuza and grew up not knowing human love. An ordinary young man, Ao, knows nothing. They fall in love and start to live together, but the evil hand is close at hand.... This is a story of first love, so cruel and so sad.

Read the prequel oneshot featuring Messiah-chan's backstory [here](https://mangadex.org/title/a53ff4b3-1514-4b91-9fa0-acd99dd797de/gomennasai-messiah-chan).
description.fr: Nezumi est une fille qui a été élevée comme tueuse à gages par les yakuzas et qui a grandi sans connaître l'amour humain. Un jeune homme ordinaire, Ao, n'en sait rien. Ils tombent amoureux et commencent à vivre ensemble, mais la main du mal est proche.... C'est l'histoire d'un premier amour, si cruel et si triste.
description.ja: ヤクザに殺し屋として育てられ、人の愛を知らずに育った少女、ねずみ。何も知らない普通の青年、碧(あお)。二人は恋に落ち、共に暮らし始めるが、魔の手はすぐそこまで迫っていた‥‥。
